name: Catmonaut
description: Captain Phish and his assistant P.E.A. have crash landed on the moon while out in space. Problem is, the moon isn't quite what we were told. This is a title I came up with for the epic mega jam/, its sorta a play on words "Cosmonaut" and Catmonaut. This was my first game jam and I will say I had an absolute BLAST. Doing something like this as a solo developer is tough and I'm sure there are a TON of issues but I'm very proud of the final product! Thanks for playing and I hope you enjoy!
